about_the_game:
Freetown Forest is a retro inspired pixel art liminal horror set in the infamous Freetown-Fallriver state forest in south eastern Massachusetts.  Play as Alan Alvez, a member of his university's paranormal research club. On his way to meet with friends for a club expedition, a sudden accident traps him in a nightmarish version of this haunted forest. Explore the area and uncover clues related to local legends and the aftermath of various dark rituals orchestrated by both malicious and innocent forces. Fend off evil presences with your flashlight and secure items that will help you on your journey and hopefully find an exit.

Features

  • Discover and explore a haunted New England forest famous for being a hotbed of supernatural activity.

  • Immerse yourself in the nostalgic vibe of pixel art graphics and analog sound.

  • Feel dread with every ghostly phone call that either helps or hinders you.

  • Do your part in keeping the forest clean by scrubbing down graffiti, remember to only use approved soap.

  • Solve environmental puzzles to access deeper parts of the forest.

  • Learn about various local legends and uncover the story of friends who disappeared while messing with a strange radio

  • Your flashlight and wits are your only weapons against the evil creatures that hunt you.

  • Let the liminal music put you in that dreadful mood

content_descriptors.notes: This game is inspired by real events associated with Satanic activity. the game shows graphic blood, and scenes of animal violence along with human death.

Freetown Forest is a retro inspired pixel art liminal horror set in the infamous Freetown-Fallriver state forest in south eastern Massachusetts.  Play as Alan Alvez, a member of his university's paranormal research club. On his way to meet with friends for a club expedition, a sudden accident traps him in a nightmarish version of this haunted forest. name: Freetown Forest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100/ AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • Memory: 800 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti/ AMD Radeon HD 7850

short_description: Come visit scenic Freetown Forest, home of the famous Profile Rock and Wampanoag reservation! And for you spooky thrill seekers come take our ghost tour and maybe feel a creepy dark presence that lurk in these dark woods. Do not feed the deer. -Massachusetts Office of Travel and Tourism.
